video: JSON/animated_video/SPIDER-MAN_ INTO THE SPIDER-VERSE - Official Trailer (HD).mp4
movie_details: After being bitten by a radioactive spider, Brooklyn teen Miles Morales gets a crash course in web-slinging from his alternate-dimension counterparts.

anime1.imgDetails: Po might just be the laziest, clumsiest panda in the Valley of Peace, but he secretly dreams of becoming a kung fu legend. When the villainous snow leopard Tai Lung threatens Po's homeland, the hapless panda is chosen to fulfil an ancient prophecy and defend the Valley from attack. Training under Master Shifu, Po embarks on an epic high-kicking adventure as he sets out to thwart Tai Lung's evil plans. A DreamWorks animation.

anime2.imgDetails: Hotel Transylvania owner Dracula pulls double duty as an overprotective dad when an unwelcome suitor shows interest in his teenage daughter.

anime3.imgDetails: In Textopolis, where the emojis are expected to display just one emotion, Gene's multiple expressions are a problem. His solution: become 'normal.'

anime4.imgVideo: JSON/animated_video/THE ANGRY BIRDS MOVIE - Official Teaser Trailer (HD).mp4
anime4.imgDetails: Sentenced to anger management class, grumpy Red becomes a hero who trains his fellow birds to unleash their inner fury when pigs invade their island.

anime5.imgDetails: Offbeat inventor Flint Lockwood must avert a mouthwatering disaster of gigantic proportions after he creates a machine that makes food fall from the sky.

anime6.imgVideo: JSON/animated_video/The Croods Trailer 2013 Dreamworks Movie - Official [HD].mp4
anime6.imgDetails: When an earthquake obliterates their cave, an unworldly prehistoric family is forced to journey through unfamiliar terrain in search of a new home.

anime7.imgVideo: JSON/animated_video/THE BOSS BABY_ FAMILY BUSINESS _ Official Trailer.mp4
anime7.imgDetails: A kid finds himself at the center of a sinister corporate plot when his parents bring home a baby who only talks business when they're not around.

anime8.imgDetails: An adventurous teenager sails out on a daring mission to save her people. During her journey, Moana meets the once-mighty demigod Maui, who guides her in her quest to become a master way-finder. Together they sail across the open ocean on an action-packed voyage, encountering enormous monsters and impossible odds. Along the way, Moana fulfills the ancient quest of her ancestors and discovers the one thing she always sought: her own identity.

anime9.imgVideo: JSON/animated_video/The Sea Beast _ Official Trailer _ Netflix.mp4
anime9.imgDetails: When a young girl stows away on the ship of a legendary sea monster hunter, they launch an epic journey into uncharted waters — and make history to boot.

anime10.imgDetails: After Mavis weds Jonathan and baby Dennis arrives, Dracula looks for proof that his grandson is a vampire and needs to remain in Transylvania.

anime11.imgDetails: After moving to a new town, a rebellious girl forms a bond with a wild mustang and finds a connection to her late mother’s legacy as a trick rider.

anime12.imgVideo: JSON/animated_video/TOM AND JERRY Trailer (4K ULTRA HD) NEW 2021.mp4
anime12.imgDetails: The classic cat-and-mouse duo creates chaos at a swanky NYC hotel when alley cat Tom is hired to get rid of scheming mouse Jerry before a VIP wedding.
